message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 14-3-1, translated into all languages

data.en: The SDG indicator 14.3.1 methodology was endorsed by IOC Member States at the Fifty-first Session of the IOC Executive Council (IOC/EC-LI/2 Annex 6 rev). The methodology was further community approved as an Ocean Best Practice (http://dx.doi.org/10.25607/OBP-655).
